Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:245#3510#Surdan} put in a request for field support. Naturally, we thought of you.

Head to Field Bace Tenacity and do what you can to help.

Oh, yes. There's so much to study and so little time.

You could best aid me by collecting specimens for study. Nothing too dangerous for a soldier like you, of course.

Ah, horntoad ichor. Intriguing.

I detect several differences in thisâ€”argon contamination, no doubt.
Ichor from {@LinkCreature:45#2002#argonomorph horntoads} will make an excellent research sample.

I'll analyze the blood and try to find the source of the contamination.

Let's hope we get something.
The corrupted blood of {@LinkCreature:45#2001#argonomorph blood fiends} would make an excellent subject of study.
Perhaps we'll unlock some link between the corrupted creatures. Thank you.

I want to analyze duckweed growing near the natural habitat of the {@LinkCreature:45#2002#argonomorph horntoads}.

It might help isolate the argons' changes.
